  • Method Details

    • calculatePoints

      protected int calculatePoints(int firstX, int firstY, int secondX, int secondY, ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions, Symbol diagSymbol, Symbol vertSymbol, int flag, int points)
      This method returns the points that a Mission cards gives based on the Player's board
      Overrides:
      calculatePoints in class Side
      Parameters:
      firstX - X coordinate of the first card
      firstY - Y coordinate of the first card
      secondX - X coordinate of the second card
      secondY - Y coordinate of the second card
      occupiedPositions - Position occupied by Player's cards in the Player's Board
      diagSymbol - Symbol that represent the cards to be checked
      vertSymbol - Symbol that represent the cards to be checked
      flag - flag that equals true if the card has already been count in a pattern
      points - points given for every combination found
      Returns:
      total points given by this card
